name: 1888 Summer Serve
preparation:
You can sip 1888 Brugal rum all year long, thanks to the complex and irresistible flavor imparted by the double-aging process. During the summer, you should try pouring this balanced and smooth rum, which has been perfected over five generations, over a refreshing ice ball made from coconut water.

Freeze coconut water into an ice ball or large cube.

Place the ice ball in a rocks glass, and pour the rum over it.
